column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////When you think about tapas/small plates you may think you'll not get enough food
column2: or that you have to get a lot tapas to be satisfied
column3: but not here. I ordered few
column4: like two or three tapas for two
column5: and was more than enough. I've been here couple times
column6: and the food was always good.
